name: Set out by surveyor & handover to Site Engineer completed
All existing services exposed and identified before trenching
Trench line and profile as per IFC drawings and as set out by surveyors
Trench must be made safe before any person may enter the trench
Comments: Trench depth > 1.5m must be shored or battered.
Base of trench inspected and tested if required.
Pipe is laid with appropriate clearance to other services
Comments: See “Table 5: Clearances from underground services”
Survey to asbuilt top of pipe before backfilling commences
Ensure warning tape and/or magslab is laid at the correct cover over the new pipes
Ensure backfill material is suitable and un-contaminated
Backfill compaction tested at every __mm lift
The above works have been inspected and are considered compliant with the drawings, specifications and instructions
